page.title: 05A FARMERS TYPICAL DAY
page.content:
animals they have to go to the auction mart one day a week.At about 12p.m. the farmer goes for his dinner.After dinner they do some more jobs e.g.till spreading or muck spreading,this improves the fields.At about 3p.m. he would do_up,this includes feeding the animals,tidying up around the farm and milking the cows again.When this was finished it would be time for a rest before having tea.After tea he would check over the farm again making ready for the following day.
by, Peter Wills.
